Text.Text: 1. The designers need to use a complex AI algorithm that is available as a 3rd party component with an API. The designers know there are a number of possible components available on marketplace, which are undergoing extensive performance evaluations.
Which Design Pattern would be suitable to reduce the impact of this eventual recommendation?

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is Bridge Pattern

Hint.Hint: The Strategy Pattern defines a family of algorithms, encapsulates each one, and makes them interchangeable; algorithms are selected at runtime. It is a behavioral pattern.

Option.Feedback: The Bridge Pattern is Correct!

Hint.Hint: The Bridge Pattern decouples an interface and its implementation. The implementation can be modified without changing the interface. It is a structural pattern.

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is Bridge Pattern1

Hint.Hint: The Factory Pattern defines an interface for creating an object, but lets the classes that implement the interface decide which class to instantiate. It is a creational pattern.

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is Bridge Pattern

Hint.Hint: The Singleton Pattern that restricts the instantiation of a class to only one object. It is a creational pattern.

Text.Text: 6. Software Development is broken into different levels of programming languages varying from first-generation (1GL) to fourth-generation (4GL)
Which of the following programming languages has the highest generation level?

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is MATLAB

Hint.Hint: JAVA is a common language used in front-end development.

Option.Feedback: MATLAB is Correct!

Hint.Hint: MATLAB is used for multi-disciplinary engineering, math, and physics fields and supports many computational options.

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is MATLAB

Hint.Hint: ASM is one of the outputs of a compiler

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is MATLAB

Hint.Hint: Binary code consists of 0's and 1's

Text.Text: 7. The Java programming language is statically-typed, which means that all variables must first be declared before they can be used.
Which of the following data types is NOT a primitive type?

Option.Feedback: Correct! Account is not a primitive data type!

Hint.Hint: Type 'account' stores account numbers

Option.Feedback: Incorrect! The correct answer is account!

Hint.Hint: A 32-bit signed two's complement integer

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is account

Hint.Hint: A single 16-bit Unicode character.

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is account

Hint.Hint: An 8-bit signed two's complement integer

Text.Text: 10. When developing a piece of software, a software engineer must determine what language to use. Applications can benefit more from certain languages and can make the process much easier.
Which programming language would be best for a piece of embedded software?

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is C

Hint.Hint: Java is an Object Oriented language with a high amount of overhead and is great for web based applications

Option.Feedback: The C Programming Language is Correct!

Hint.Hint: The C Programming Language is general purpose and allows low-level access to memory, minimal run-time support, and cross-platform programming. It follows the "trust the programmer" mentality.

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is C

Hint.Hint: Cobol is a compiled English-like language that is imperative, procedural, and object oriented. It is mainly used in a business setting.

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is C

Hint.Hint: PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used as a general purpose programming language.

Text.Text: 11. Software Engineers can use many different development models, or life cycles, when creating a piece of software.
Which of these models is considered to be the fastest growing and more companies are using it?

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is Agile - Scrum

Hint.Hint: The Waterfall Model is a sequential design process in which progress flows steadily downward through 8 different phases.

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is Agile - Scrum

Hint.Hint: Rapid Prototyping is a group of techniques used to quickly fabricate a scale model or incomplete piece of software.

Option.Feedback: Agile - Scrum is correct!

Hint.Hint: Agile - Scrum is an iterative framework that is flexible and allows the team to adapt to quickly changing requirements. Many times this all has face-to-face meetings with all team members.

Option.Feedback: Sorry - The correct answer is Agile - Scrum

Hint.Hint: The Code and Fix mentality dictates that a programmer will just begin to code and will fix problems as they arise.
